channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Bicycle without lock near school gate on hyes place sude road of tesco lisson Grove, 3rd October
item.description:
Bicycle without lock parked on gate near school at Hyaat place road side of tesco lisson Grove could be stolen need to be secured.

item.title: Control Parking Zone Sign spray painted Hotspot, 3rd October
item.description:
Control Parking Zone sign painted over with spray paint. This Hotspot cannot stay clean for more than 2-3 weekdays. There’s no parking spaces available for local residents or visitors to the nearby amenities and businesses close by.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Fielding Street, Walworth, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Overhanging tree, 3rd October
item.description:
I reported some time ago that the tree outside my house sheds branches into my front garden, the larger ones of which have scratched my car parked on my drive. i was told this would be added to the contractor's list but this was ages ago and it has still not been done.thank you
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Belmont Avenue, Falconwood, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Clapton terrace bins overflowing, 3rd October
item.description:
Mountains of rubbish on Clapton terrace overflowing onto street as rubbish hasn’t been collected in weeks. Please can rubbish be collected this is becoming a health hazard

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Clapton Terrace, Hackney, London

item.title: Lime bikes, 3rd October
item.description:
To council, We have had serious problems with line bikes being picked up and distributed at 4 am at night each disturbing the whole neighbourhood. They are placing line bikes outside of designated parking spot. They’re now lime bikes all over the street.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Forest Grove, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Huge fly tip freezers , washing machines , garden fences, 3rd October
item.description:
A huge fly tip in the woods in separate places freezers, washing machines, fences , garden waste, mattresses, big bits of plastic all over the woods. A van or lorry must of drove on and literally thrown the stuff. This is absolutely horrendous. This morning loads of dog walkers and children having to navigate around it.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Wayside Green Open Space, Elmstead, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Chain removed from emergency access gate turning street into rat run, 3rd October
item.description:
Someone has removed the chain and padlock from the emergency access gate which is turning the street into rat run from Marsh Hill to Kenworthy Road. Contractors removed the bespoke lock on the gate some time ago and never replaced it.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Swinnerton Street, Hackney, London

item.title: Very low overhanging branch onto property No 1, 3rd October
item.description:
As this tree suffered a sudden broken branch blocking the road a few months back in reporting it I asked for the tree to be assessed for long overdue maintenance. One branch in particular is now so low onto my property I am concerned Its a lovely tree that needs some tlc please before we need another emergency call out

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Perry Hall Road, Poverest, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly tipping, 3rd October
item.description:
Some furniture has been fly-tipped at this location three days ago, and it has not been collected since. Additionally, the street rubbish has not been cleared, and foxes have torn open the bags, spreading waste all over the pavement. This is creating an unsanitary and unpleasant environment for residents and passersby. Could you please arrange for an urgent collection and cleaning of the area? Its at post box infront of mems corner cafe 124 Cheltenham road se15 3ar

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 116, Cheltenham Road, Nunhead, London
Report on FixMyStreet
